item.title: The Road to Glory
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Pure_:

Honestly though I find MMOs so pointless post-puberty. I hope you’re enjoying this!

I think its mostly the time aspect. As vain_ mentioned his options are limited. Sadly we chose a pretty shitty MMORPG to play, as its current state looks to be pretty broken and unbalanced.

I’m sure once you get to the point of being able to have the stats/armour PVM is still pretty entertaining. Is that your goal vain?

Read full topic

item.title: The Road to Glory
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:552366”]I could use you on some dungeon runs (Lower level players drop the combat levels of the npcs)

I’ve seen some people max in like a month, so good luck.[/quote]cb is currently 75 so not too much help, but if you wanna do some floors lemme know

[quote=“ox random xi, post:3, topic:552366”]the fact you have any 99s and almost little to none quests done, even the free ones amazes me[/quote]quite a few of them were reset when the quests were redone. but i was never much of a quester to begin lol

Read full topic
